Lyric:
[00:15.000]I'm holding on your rope,
[00:16.390]Got me ten feet off the ground
[00:21.780]I'm hearing what you say but I just can't make a sound
[00:29.410]You tell me that you need me
[00:31.360]Then you go and cut me down, but wait
[00:36.790]You tell me that you're sorry
[00:38.680]Didn't think I'd turn around, and say...
[00:45.660]That It's too late to apologize, it's too late...
[00:53.470]I said it's too late to apologize, it's too late...
[01:08.000]
[01:17.700]I'd take another chance, take a fall
[01:20.160]Take a shot for you
[01:25.080]I need you like a heart needs a beat
[01:27.280]But it's nothing new, yeah yeah
[01:32.230]I loved you with the fire red
[01:34.910]Now it's turning blue, and you say
[01:40.950]Sorry like the angel heaven let me think was you
[01:46.380]But I'm afraid(I'm afraid)
[01:49.800]That It's too late to apologize, it's too late..
[01:56.800]I said it's too late to apologize, it's too late...
[02:04.520]It's too late to apologize, too late, too late, too late
[02:11.190]I said it's too late to apologize, it's too late...
[02:12.740]
[02:48.070]It's too late to apologize, it's too late
[02:49.600]It's too late to apologize, it's too late
[02:55.240]Holding on your rope, got me ten feet off the ground...
[03:03.800]
[03:11.280]
